mapper.select: SELECT EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME, CATEGORY, CAPACITY, IS_ON, SERIAL_NUMBER, STORE_ID FROM EQUIPMENT WHERE STORE_ID = #{store_id} and category = '쓰레기통'

SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_NAME, TOKEN FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID IN (SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID FROM WORK WHERE STORE_ID = (SELECT STORE_ID FROM EQUIPMENT WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipment_id})) AND TOKEN IS NOT NULL
SELECT STORE_NAME, CATEGORY FROM STORE JOIN EQUIPMENT USING (STORE_ID) WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipment_id}
